column4: Hey. i'm having some problems with my internet connection.. Browser works 50% of the time, other 50% just loads and loads. Transmission won't start downloading and messes up my browser the second it starts. I have to restart my browser for it to work again..

Hey. i'm having some problems with my internet connection.. Browser works 50% of the time, other 50% just loads and loads. Transmission won't start downloading and messes up my browser the second it starts. I have to restart my browser for it to work again..
what do you use?  Wireless connection or cable connection ?
